Posts.Content: Hi I am going to have nipple reconstruction in  a few weeks and cant wait as it feels like the cherry on the cake after my reconstruction.  They have proposed nipple sharing surgery for me, (taking a piece of the nipple on my good boob to make a new nipple for my reconstructed boob).  Has anyone had this type of surgery done or any other nipple reconstruction, I would love to here. Anne xx
Posts.Title: Nipple Reconstruction????

Posts.Content: Nice to here from you Nikki I am also having augmentation to my right  breast, at the same time as the nipple reconstruction so I can get all my surgery at the one time.  Is it ok if I send you a friend request so I can keep in touch if I go into hospital first. Anne
Posts.Title: Nipple Reconstruction????
